short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Count words on selected text anytime!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sometime you may want to quickly count the words of free text on a webpage, Word Counter is a right tool for you to get word statistics. 

Simply select the text of interest and then right click to open its context menu. After clicking on menu item "Easy Word Counter", you will immediately see statistical results including the number of words and characters as well as average word length and the longest word etc. 

More statistics will be added in new version soon!
